intents.description: Analyze overall NPS and satisfaction levels to assess customer loyalty and satisfaction.
Compare satisfaction across different subscription plans to identify if enterprise customers are more satisfied than free/basic users.
Analyze feature usage correlation with satisfaction to identify which features drive the highest satisfaction.
Segment customers by tenure and analyze NPS to understand the satisfaction profile of long-term vs new customers.
Identify at-risk customers with low NPS and low purchase intent to assess retention risk.

rationale: The analysis plan aims to provide actionable insights into customer satisfaction and loyalty, identify key drivers of satisfaction and dissatisfaction, and highlight segments that require attention for improvement. By analyzing NPS, satisfaction levels, feature usage, and demographic patterns, we can pinpoint areas for product enhancement and retention strategies, ultimately supporting business decisions and informing the Q1 product roadmap.
